Room.Name: Eastern Trail
Room.Description: This dusty trail extends to the west towards great fields and hills. The trodden dirt beneath you looks used by thousands of soldiers, carts, and horses.

Room.Name: Eastern Trail
Room.Description: This dusty trail extends to the west towards great fields and hills. The trodden dirt beneath you looks used by thousands of soldiers, carts, and horses.

Room.Name: Bloody fields
Room.Description: Shouts and screams pierce the air from near and afar. Metal clangs can be heard from all around. The filthy soil is wet, soaked with blood. Fields extend in all directions, except a trail leads off in the eastern direction.

Room.Name: Bloody fields
Room.Description: Shouts and screams pierce the air from near and afar. Metal clangs can be heard from all around. The filthy soil is wet, soaked with blood. The fields extend in all directions.

Room.Name: Southern Trail
Room.Description: This dusty trail is south of the great March Hill. The trodden dirt beneath you looks used by thousands of soldiers, carts, and horses.

Room.Name: March Hill
Room.Description: You are standing atop March Hill. Fields strewn with blood surround you and piles of corpses cover the ground. More metal clanging can be heard from around and beneath you. You can see Storm Hill in the north west direction of you.

Room.Name: Storm Hill
Room.Description: You are standing atop Storm Hill. Fields strewn with blood surround you and piles of corpses cover the ground. More metal clanging can be heard from around and beneath you. You can see March Hill south of you.

NPC.name: swordsman soldier human
NPC.description: This soldier is covered with grime and blood. He looks weary from the battles, but continues to fight.
NPC.longDescription: A human soldier is here, advancing against the hoard.

NPC.name: swordsman paladin human
NPC.description: This holy paladin is covered with grime and blood. He looks weary from the battles, but continues to fight.
NPC.longDescription: A holy paladin is here, advancing against the hoard.

NPC.name: captain troll evil
NPC.description: This captain grins evilly as he orders his minions.
NPC.longDescription: A troll captain is here, ordering goblins.

NPC.name: goblin soldier evil
NPC.description: This soldier grins evilly and cackles with delight as blood is spilled.
NPC.longDescription: A goblin soldier is here, swarming the humans in numbers.

NPC.name: body corpse
NPC.description: This corpse was once a soldier on this field. Now it lays here, mutilated and dead.
NPC.longDescription: An unrecognizable body is here, dying.

NPC.name: sir lothar warrior
NPC.description: This tall, broad man stands tall and strong. His face is covered with dirt and sweat as he continues to command his troops to press forward.
NPC.longDescription: A tall human warrior stands here, slaying goblins with every blow.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior Healer Rescue AssistAlign
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil DetectIllusion

NPC.name: youatt warrior
NPC.description: This huge, ugly woman towers over her troops and screams vulgarities as she strangles and whips the enemy. She looks like a hairy French whore.
NPC.longDescription: A huge, hairy woman stands here, cackling insanely as she slays humans.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: raag anti paladin anti-paladin
NPC.description: This huge fire giant flames with anger as he lashes out at anything moving. With every corpse he creates, he seems to get stronger.
NPC.longDescription: A huge fire giant stands here, massacring troops with his axe.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Berserk DetectIllusion

NPC.name: sir cire paladin
NPC.description: This tall, broad man stands tall and strong. His face is covered with dirt and sweat as he continues to command his troops to press forward. He communes blessings and calls wrath apon his enemies.
NPC.longDescription: A strong human Paladin stands here, calling apon the wrath of God.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Cleric Warrior Healer Rescue AssistAlign
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil DetectIllusion

Item.Name: silver longsword lothar
Item.LongDescription: A flawless silver longsword lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse Unholy

Item.Name: spear youatt bloody
Item.LongDescription: A huge, bloody spear lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse Unholy TwoHands

Item.Name: raag huge double axe flames
Item.LongDescription: A giant double-bladed axe lies here in flames.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum NoDrop AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: cire mace glowing purity
Item.LongDescription: A glowing mace hovers here, pulsing with purity.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse

Item.Name: helmet salvation
Item.LongDescription: The helmet of salvation hovers here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse

Item.Name: breastplate righteousness
Item.LongDescription: The breastplate of righteousness hovers here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof

Item.Name: robe malignancy
Item.LongDescription: The robe of malignancy hovers here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove NoUncurse

Item.Name: belt malice
Item.LongDescription: The belt of malice hover here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Evil AntiGood AntiNeutral NoRemove NoUncurse

Item.Name: shield faith
Item.LongDescription: The shield of faith hovers here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse

Item.Name: boots readiness
Item.LongDescription: The boots of readiness hover here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse

Item.Name: belt truth
Item.LongDescription: The belt of truth hovers here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum AntiEvil AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse
